title: Enhancing Science Education Effectiveness Through Remote Teaching Interaction Pattern Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course focusing on real-time interaction in smartphone-based limited-technology environments; formative assessment-centered operation

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain at least three types of teacher-learner interactions in remote environments
Learners can systematically analyze real-time video class recordings using content analysis tools
Learners can propose at least two effective interaction strategies for science curriculum design based on analysis results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
